channel.title: Read-able Stuff? {PI 317}

item.title: Read-able Stuff? {PI 317}
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Don’t put it at the very bottom, add it somewhere in the middle and use this;

case 3103: c.sendMessage("Iou Means I Owned You Once6969"); break;

I haven’t made one click items in a while, so I might edit this.

Edit; Sorry, I had the wrong class, put it in the ClickItem class and you might have to use this;

if(itemId == 3103) { c.sendMessage("Iou Means I Owned You Once6969"); }
If ’ c.sendMessage ’ doesn’t work, go ahead and try using ’ c.getPA().sendMessage ’

Read full topic

item.title: Read-able Stuff? {PI 317}
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

I want the Iou to be readable when click on it.

So far this is what i got.

public void firstClickItem(int itemId) { switch(itemId) { case 3103: c.getPA().sendFrame126("Iou Means I Owned You Once6969); } } }
[b]
I put this under actionhandler.java at the very bottom… is this correct?

Edit: It didnt work in game, it didnt show up at all.[/b]

Read full topic
